name: Andrélon Special conditioner oil en care
composition: INGREDIËNTEN: Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Cocos Nucifera Oil (Kokosolie), Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil (Arganolie), Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil (Marula-olie), Butyrospermum Parkii Butter (Sheaboter), Behentrimonium Chloride, Parfum, Dipropylene Glycol, Lactic Acid, Amodimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Cetrimonium Chloride, PEG-7 Propylheptyl Ether, Magnesium Nitrate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Coumarin, Linalool, CI 17200, CI 19140.
